text: usane kaha, "jo bhojan tumhen mila karata hai vah tumhaare paas nahin aa paega, usake tumhaare paas aane se pahale hee main tumhen isaka arth bata doonga. yah un baaton mein se hai, jo mere rab ne mujhe sikhaee hai. main to un logon ka tareeqa chhodakar, jo allaah ko nahin maanate aur jo aakhirat (paralok) ka inakaar karate hain
